paper_abstract: The main goal of research reported in this paper is to propose a new technique for schemata count of Genetic Algorithms. Till recently, no methods existed for counting the schemata except the manual one that was obviously cursed by the tedium involved. A substantially generalized expression has been developed that directly computes the number of unique (different) schemata in a population, using breakup of similarity bits for non-repeated strings. (C) 2010 Elsevier B. V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Towards generalized expression for schemata count
